question:
####UFAQ [Damon Stone]
If the Runner adds Political Graffiti to an [AstroScript Pilot Program](/en/card/01081), is the AstroScript worth negative 1 agenda point or 1 agenda point?
answer:
It would be worth 1 agenda point.

If the Runner adds Political Graffiti to a [Project Beale](/en/card/02115) with an agenda counter on it, how many agenda points is the Beale worth?
